name: Jr. Jones demo
description:
PLAY ON FULLSCREEN! AND DO NOT READ THE DESCRIPTION BECAUSE THAT LUL SAID IT WAS TRASH

JrJones is a small game about getting the highest score. You move around with the arrow keys and jump with the space bar. There are four different obstacles that you must try to survive. You have the arrows, the axe, the stones and the laser. Their are also diffrent levels of difficulty that change every 30 points. From lowest to highest: Blue, Green, Yellow, Orange, Red and ..... .This version is just a demo and definitely not the final version.
